/usr/bin/c++    -std=c++0x -Wl,--no-as-needed  -Wall -ffunction-sections   -fomit-frame-pointer -O2 -ffast-math -DNDEBUG  -lpthread      CMakeFiles/raspicam_cv_test.dir/raspicam_cv_test.cpp.o  -o raspicam_cv_test -rdynamic ../src/libraspicam.so.0.1.6 ../src/libraspicam_cv.so /opt/vc/lib/libmmal_core.so /opt/vc/lib/libmmal_util.so /opt/vc/lib/libmmal.so -lopencv_calib3d -lopencv_contrib -lopencv_core -lopencv_features2d -lopencv_flann -lopencv_highgui -lopencv_imgproc -lopencv_legacy -lopencv_ml -lopencv_objdetect -lopencv_photo -lopencv_stitching -lopencv_ts -lopencv_video -lopencv_videostab -Wl,-rpath,/home/pi/raspicam-0.1.6_yj/build/src:/opt/vc/lib:
